mapper.sql: select distinct b.id, b.tenant_id, b.algoarena_id, ci.algoarena_name, b.customer_id, c.nick_name, b.num_ticket, b.promotion_id, b.total_price, b.payment_flag, b.showtime_id, m.title as movie_name, b.create_time from booking b left join customer c on b.customer_id = c.user_id left join showtime s on b.showtime_id = s.id left join movie m on s.movie_id = m.id left join algoarena ci on b.algoarena_id = ci.id
